VersionInfo.Title: Documentation Monster 0.4 is now available
VersionInfo.Detail:
This is a pre-release build:
* Initial Beta Release * Support for project management * Rich editing support * Build Web Site Html output * Output to Web, Pdf, Html and Markdown * Publish via FTP * plus [much more...](https://github.com/RickStrahl/DocumentationMonster/blob/main/Changelog.md)
